title: (x) casual handwritten script - Brisa {Stephen}
content:
Letters are consistent so I’m guessing that this is a font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060346im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/w1_3460.jpg)

 [‹ (x) NSGA logo slab serif - City, URW Egyptienne {Erik S, Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060346/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40834 "Go to previous forum topic") [Album cover fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060346/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40807 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: If you don’t find it, there are always these [casual handwritten](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060346/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/contemporary-handwriting-fonts/) options.

Ah, looking at my own list I see it’s [Brisa Alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605060346/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/sudtipos/brisa_alternates/?sample_text=Way%20People%20&sample_size=96&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1).
Very nice font, thank you for the find
